comments:
I was testing the source build this morning and noticed the that linux-gtk-ppc
drop wouldn't start.  So I tried the one generated with the build and the same
result...

./eclipse -vm ~kmoir/jdks/IBMJava2-ppc-142/jre/bin/java  -vmargs -Dosgi.locking=none


!SESSION 2005-05-26 11:44:30.992 -----------------------------------------------
eclipse.buildId=N20050525-0010

BootLoader constants: OS=linux, ARCH=ppc, WS=gtk, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments:  -os linux -ws gtk -arch ppc

!ENTRY org.eclipse.osgi 2005-05-26 11:44:32.798
!MESSAGE Application error

Should be fixed in whatever build Veronika rebuilt the libraries for...

Somebody changed the C code for the JNI libraries and forgot to recompile on 
all affected platforms.  This is bound to happen from time to time unless we 
can make the build process compile the C code too (on the correct platform).

Closing as fixed because the libraries were all rebuilt for the RC1 candidate 
build at noon.
